ape rate bahuthara sinhala bauddha aya aakalpamaya wenasakata akamathiyi.wame aya hithanne samawita owun hari kiya.dakshinanshika aya hithanawa api thamayi hari kiya.wyaparayak karana ekath lesi na.liyakiyawili,pagawa,niladhari mannaya nisa samaharu wade athharinawa.diyunu rataka nam apita udaw karanawa.anith de rassawak ganna api mahansi wenna oona.tika dawasak niyameta job eka karanawa.eeta passe godak ayata mokadda wenawa.onna othanadi thamayi sewaka ayithiwasikam haraha deshapalana bhuthayo enne.anith paththen balapuwama samahara wyaparikayoth ganna deyak na.mokadda hethuwa?nithiya kiyana de lankawe nathieka.ehew rataka swayan winayak yatathe selinko wani aayathana hondata giyathamayi.namuth awasanaya kohomada ?me rate nithiyak na kiya yalith thahawuru una.rajaye aayathanawala wada karanawa aduyi.ahannkarakama wadiyi.pudgalika aayathana minissunta garukara salakanawa.ee ema aayathanawala winaya nisa.nithiya passata yawa ee thanata deshapalana kalakanni aawama badu banis.malunta pinanna wathura oona wage lankawe deshapalakayo kiyana ewuntath thama pawathmata mokak hari prashnayak oona.kisima sinhala deshapaluwekuta rata wadagath na.uuta oona uu hadenna.ehew rataka ratata saha janathawata aadaraya karana wyaparikayo balaporoththuwimata pera ape mole pariksa kara ganima wati.

kolambaa lumbini widyalaye wishramika guru githanjali susila athukorala (samarawira) - shokayata path dayabara swamipurushaya aananda athukorala, diyaniya semitha, bana athula abesekara, munupura mantha minipiriya isini, sahodariyan manel, ayirangani, indrani saha sohoyura nihal.
